body.content: <text x="50%" y="50%" font-family="system-ui, -apple-system, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Noto Sans', 'Liberation Sans', Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol', 'Noto Color Emoji'" font-size="50" fill="{{colors.text}}" text-anchor="middle" dy="17.8">{{initials}}</text>
